title: Frontend Intern
description: Developed and maintained responsive websites for ~60 international dental clinics using ReactJS, Next.js and WordPress. Built user-friendly interfaces for clinic services, dental team showcases and online appointment booking. Optimized responsive layouts, page performance and navigation flows across devices. Integrated frontend with RESTful APIs and collaborated with backend systems for data handling and authentication. Contributed to internal projects with Framer, creating interactive UI components and rapid prototypes.

title: Fullstack Intern
description: Designed and optimized the frontend for AutoTMS (Transport Management System), focusing on performance and scalability. Implemented UI features for Group Management, Vehicle Management and Vehicle Maintenance modules. Integrated frontend components with backend services built on NestJS, Strapi, Prisma ORM and GraphQL, ensuring accurate and consistent data rendering. Collaborated on code reviews to improve code quality and team development standards.

title: IT Intern
description: Developed and optimized frontend interfaces for internal web applications using ReactJS and modern UI practices. Built the frontend for an AI-based pest diagnosis system (PagoSolution), integrating model results into the user interface. Improved UI performance and responsiveness, reducing load time and enhancing user interaction. Designed and implemented a responsive UI for the IECES project, ensuring cross-device compatibility. Collaborated with NestJS backend services for API consumption and application data handling.
